alldb.table_sql:
select *From ( select ci.id as cid, rentplan.id as id, ci.contract_id as contractid, cinfo.cust_name as custname, rentplan.taxtype as plantypeid, case rentplan.taxtype when 'corpusone' then '本金一次性开票' when 'rent' then '租金' when 'corpus' then '本金' when 'interest' then '利息' end as plantype, rentplan.rentlist as rentlist, rentplan.plandate as plandate, rentplan.planmoney as planmoney, rentplan.planmoney-isnull(rentplan.exportmoney,0) as balanceexportmoney,
tds1.name_ as rentinvoicetype, cit.tax_reg_code as taxregcode, cit.tax_bank as taxbank, cit.tax_acc as taxacc, cit.invoice_phone as phone, cit.invoice_add as regaddress, case when isnull(rentplan.invoice_status,0)=0 then '未申请' when isnull(rentplan.invoice_status,0)=1 then '已退回' when isnull(rentplan.invoice_status,0)=2 and isnull(rentplan.exportmoney,0)=0 then '已申请' when isnull(rentplan.invoice_status,0)=2 and isnull(rentplan.exportmoney,0)!=0 then '已导出' end as status, tds2.name_ as leaseform from ( select rii.id as id,cfrp.contract_id as contractid,rii.tax_type as taxtype,exporttab.exportmoney as exportmoney, rii.invoice_status,cfrp.plan_date as plandate,cfrp.rent_list as rentlist, --case rii.tax_type when 'corpusone' then cfrp.corpus when 'rent' then cfrp.rent when 'corpus' then cfrp.corpus when 'interest' then cfrp.interest end planmoney rii.money as planmoney from rent_invoice_info rii left join contract_fund_rent_plan cfrp on rii.cfrp_id=cfrp.id left join ( select down.rent_invoice_id, isnull(sum(down.invoice_money),0) as exportmoney from rent_invoice_download_info down where down.rent_invoice_id is not null group by down.rent_invoice_id )exporttab on rii.id=exporttab.rent_invoice_id where --开票种类为发票 rii.bill_type='invoice' --计划开票 and rii.cfrp_id is not null --状态为已申请 --and rii.invoice_status=2 and rii.tax_type!='corpusone'
union all
select corpusone.id as id,corpusone.contractid as contractid,corpusone.taxtype as taxtype,exporttab.exportmoney as exportmoney, corpusone.invoice_status,cc.start_date as plandate,1 as rentlist, case when (select td.description_ From t_dicts_datas td where td.id_='iscorpusone.01')='否' then isnull(cc.equip_amt,0)-isnull(cc.first_payment,0) else cc.equip_amt end as planmoney from ( select rii.contract_id as id,rii.contract_id as contractid,max(rii.tax_type) as taxtype, max(rii.invoice_status) as invoice_status from rent_invoice_info rii where --开票种类为发票 rii.bill_type='invoice' --状态为已申请 --and rii.invoice_status=2 and rii.tax_type='corpusone' group by rii.contract_id ) corpusone left join ( select down.contract_id, isnull(sum(down.invoice_money),0) as exportmoney from rent_invoice_download_info down where down.rent_invoice_id is null group by down.contract_id )exporttab on corpusone.contractid=exporttab.contract_id
left join contract_condition cc on corpusone.contractid=cc.contract_id
)rentplan left join contract_info ci on rentplan.contractid=ci.id left join contract_invoice_type cit on ci.id=cit.contract_id left join t_dicts_datas tds1 on cit.invoice_type=tds1.id_ left join t_dicts_datas tds2 on ci.leas_form = tds2.id_ left join cust_info cinfo on ci.cust_id=cinfo.id
where 1=1 --剩余导出金额 --and rentplan.planmoney-isnull(rentplan.exportmoney,0)>0 ) list where 1=1 /~status: and list.status in ('<<status>>') ~/ /~contractid: and list.contractid like '%{contractid}%' ~/ /~contractnumber: and list.contractnumber like '%{contractnumber}%' ~/ /~custname: and list.custname like '%{custname}%' ~/ /~plandateStart: and list.plandate >='{plandateStart}' ~/ /~plandateEnd: and list.plandate <='{plandateEnd}' ~/ /~plantype: and list.plantype like '%{plantype}%' ~/ /~balanceexportmoneyMin: and list.balanceexportmoney >'{balanceexportmoneyMin}' ~/ /~balanceexportmoneyMax: and list.balanceexportmoney <'{balanceexportmoneyMax}' ~/ /~leaseform: and list.leaseform = '{leaseform}' ~/ <EXTRACTEND> order by contractid,rentlist<EXTRACTEND>
